overview: The high price of urban housing has its erotic consequences! When Rachel Ryan and Randy Spears decide to share an in-town apartment, horny hell breaks loose all over the place! Randy and Rachel's love lives are very active! While Randy is making love to his girlfriend in the bedroom, Rachel's savoring a nasty nooner on the couch! And when Sharon Kane shows up, this insatiable nympho takes on any man or woman who's left over! You'd have to be an air traffic controller to track all the steamy sexual action! This torrid environment finally breaks down the resistance between the two roommates for a sizzling orgy with Nina Hartley in the end. They're going to keep this Love Nest rented for a long time!
title: The Love Nest
